names.english: regulate the middle and calm roundworms decoction
names.commonEnglish: Regulate the Middle and Calm Roundworms Decoction

actions: Tonifies Spleen and Stomach Qi and tonifies Qi in Deficiency patients with Exterior conditions.
With Ren Shen, tonifies the transformation and transportation functions of the Spleen.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness, promotes water metabolism, stabilizes the Exterior and stops sweating.
With Gan Jiang, eliminates Cold Dampness in the Spleen for frequent diarrhea due to Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.
With Gan Jiang and Ren Shen, for Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.
Promotes urination,leaches out Dampness, strengthens the Spleen and harmonizes the Middle Jiao.
With Ren Shen and Bai Zhu, for a weak and deficient Spleen with fatigue, anorexia and loose stools.
Kills parasites, warms the Middle Jiao, disperses Cold, dispels Dampness, relieves diarrhea and alleviates abdominal pain.
Warms the Middle, expels Cold and dispels Wind-Dampness.
With Fu Ling and Bai Zhu, for Cold-Dampness in the Lower Jiao leading to a sense of heaviness and Cold in the lower back.

symptoms: Passing roundworms in very loose, unformed stools
Mild constant epigastric pain; relieved by warmth and pressure
Abdominal pain and fullness after meals
Maybe clear, watery, copious vaginal discharge
manifestations.tongueCoat: White and greasy or Thin and white
